name: RegexpUtils_escapeRegexTest
description: Unit tests for the RegexpUtils.escapeRegex method, which escapes special characters in a string for use in a regular expression.

test_cases.name: testEscapeRegex_NoSpecialChars
test_cases.description: Tests the escapeRegex method with a string containing no special characters.

test_cases.name: testEscapeRegex_WithSpecialChars
test_cases.description: Tests the escapeRegex method with a string containing special characters.

test_cases.name: testEscapeRegex_AllSpecialChars
test_cases.description: Tests the escapeRegex method with a string containing all special characters.
